Set-up chunk
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
drought_clean2 = drought_clean1|>
  arrange(fips)
droughtandmaster = merge(master_data, drought_clean2)
droughtandmaster = droughtandmaster|>
  mutate(cat4dummy = cat_4 > 0)|>
  mutate(droughtseverity = ifelse(cat_4 > 0, 5,
                                  ifelse(cat_3 > 0, 4,
                                         ifelse(cat_2 > 0, 3,
                                                ifelse(cat_1 > 0, 2,
                                                       ifelse(cat_0 > 0, 1, 0))))))
```
